markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deity's Domain](/Feats.aspx?ID=5883) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 93 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You embody an aspect of your deity. Choose one of your deity's [domains](Domains.aspx). You gain the domain's initial domain spell as a devotion spell.

<title level="2">Deity's Domain leads to...</title>
[Advanced Deity's Domain](/Feats.aspx?ID=5902)
name: Deity's Domain
